source: Kasasiro ku erikujunda enuuka.

source: Kasasiro neeyoorwa buri kwezi kugira ngu etaba nyingi.

source: Okukwatanisa nikubaasisa eby'entaatsya kweyongyera.

source: Amahanga okukora hamwe eby'obushubuzi nikigasira amahanga goona.

source: Amahanga agahikaine, gashemereire kukwatanisa.

source: Omugisha gw'omwishiki kumaririza emishomo ye nigukirwa ogw'omwojo.

source: Amashomero agarikuhwerwa Gavumenti nigaheereza abantu kurungi.

source: Akakiiko k'eby'okwerinda omu kyaro nikarinda abantu omu byanga.
reference: The local defence unit protects people in the community.

source: Omurimo gw'okuronda abakozi nigutwariramu abakozesa okuganiira n'abaheireyo okushaba kwabo.
reference: Recruitment exercise involves interaction between the employer and the applicant.

source: Guma noogyezaho nobu waakuba otarabiremu.
reference: Keep trying even if you fail.

source: Obwegyese n'ekishumuruzo ky'obusinguzi.
reference: Education is the key to success.

source: Obwegyese niburugwamu okujumbura okurikureeta entunguuka.
reference: Education leads to creativity and innovation that could result in development.

source: Abantu baingi nibaremwa okutunga emirimo ahabw'okuba tibarashomire.
reference: Most people lose out on job opportunities because they did not attend school.

source: Abantu bashemereire kuhaburwa aha mugasho gw'obwegyese.
reference: Communities should be sensitised on the benefits of education.

source: Okugaba emirimo aharurengo rwa Disiturikiti, nikuba kuriho abantu baingi.
reference: Recruitments at the district level are usually massive.

source: Abakozesa buriijo nibataho omuhendo gw'abakozi abu barikwenda.
reference: Usually, the employer sets a reference number of required recruits.

source: Gulu n'emwe ahari disiturikiti eziri omu Uganda.
reference: Gulu district is one of the districts in Uganda.

source: Baingi abarikutendekwa kurinda ekyaro nibaba bari eminyeeto.
reference: Most of the local defence unit recruits are youths.

source: Abatendekirwe kurinda ekyaro bari abarikutwariza kubi abantu.
reference: The local defence unit has cruel officers.

source: Hashemereire kubaho enteekateeka nungi kubaasa kutunguura eby'obwegyese.
reference: Adequate planning needs to be done in order to grow the education sector.

source: Eby'emizaano n'eby'obwegyese bishemerire kukorera hamwe.
reference: Sports and education work should be done hand in hand.

source: Gavumenti ya Uganda, amashomero ga Gavumenti egahereize ebintu bingi.
reference: The government of Uganda has availed lots of grants for public schools.

source: Ekirikureetera abaana bamwe kwega kubi omu mashomero n'enki?
reference: What causes some children not to pass well in school?

source: Ebirikukozesibwa omu buhingi n'oburiisa n'eby'omuhendo gw'ahaiguru aha bantu abarikubikozesa.
reference: Agricultural equipment is very expensive for farmers.

source: Abaana baingi nibaremwa kuhendera emishomo yaabo ahabw'eibura rya sente.
reference: Many children fail to complete school because of inadequate funds.

source: Okwejumba omu bizinesi n'omuringo gumwe gw'okutunga ebishare by'amashomero.
reference: Getting involved in a business is one way of finding children's school fees.

source: Eby'obuhingi n'obushubuzi nibihwera eby'obwegyese omu miringo etari emwe.
reference: Other sectors like agriculture and business support education in one way or the other.

source: Buri omwe ashemereire kuba naabaasa eby'obwegyese.
reference: Education should be affordable for everyone.

source: Eby'obwegyese nibyeteega esente.
reference: The education sector requires funding.

source: Abantu bashemereire kusomesibwa ahaby'obuyonjo n'ebihorooni.
reference: The community should be sensitised on hygiene and sanitation-related issues.

source: Ab'obushoborozi baine obujunaanizibwa kuzibira ebihagaro.
reference: Authorities have the obligation to prevent crime.

source: Hariho purogyekiti y'okwombekyera abantu ebihorooni erikugyenda omu maisho.
reference: There is an ongoing project to build toilets for people in the community.

source: Omuntu nayeteega rayisinsi erikumwikiriza kukora emirimo ye.
reference: One needs a licence to operate legally.

source: Obuyonjo n'omuhanda gumwe gw'okuzibira endwara.
reference: Hygiene is one way of preventing diseases.

source: Okunaganaga obubi bw'abantu, nikibaasa kureeta endwara.
reference: Misplacement of human waste can lead to diseases.

source: Kigumire okushanga akatare akayonjo.
reference: It is hard to find a clean market.

source: Akatare nikazamu abantu baingi kuruga omu bicweka ebitari bimwe na bimwe.
reference: A market attracts very many people from different societies and backgrounds.

source: Bakamubeeherera kwonka ka turinde ebirikuza kuruga omu kooti.
reference: He/she was falsely accused, but let us wait for the court ruling.

source: Kampuni ezimwe zikaremwa kushashura abakozi baazo omu keshereko.
reference: Some companies failed to pay their workers during the lockdown period.

source: Abashaho tibakasiimirwe ahabw'emirimo ei baakozire.
reference: Health workers have not been appreciated for their efforts.

source: Abakozi hati nibabaasa kukorera omuka nainga baije aha ofiisi.
reference: Workers can now choose to work from home or come to the office.

source: Korona ejanjaire omu mahanga g'ensi yoona.
reference: Coronavirus has spread in every country in the world.

source: Buri kampuni neegyezaho munonga okureeba ngu abakazi baayo baine obusingye.
reference: Every company is under pressure to provide a safe working environment for its workers.

source: Abanya Uganda abarikukorera aheeru, bazibiirwe okugaruka omu ihanga ryabo ahabw'oburwaire.
reference: Ugandans working abroad have been stopped from coming back due to the pandemic.

source: Abakozi boona bakemerezibwa mukama wa bizinesi.
reference: All contracts were terminated by the business owner.

source: Abakozi nibahigwa okutunga ekihuumuro kugira ngu baruhukye.
reference: Employees are encouraged to take leave in order to improve their health.

source: Abakozi baingi abaabire nibakora aha reediyo bakacwamu kurekura emirimo yaabo .
reference: Most of the employees decided to resign from the radio station.

source: Abantu baingi bafereirwe emirimo yaabo omu keeshereko.
reference: Very many people have lost their jobs during the lockdown.

source: Oburwaire bukarabanisamu emirimo mingi ya bizinesi.
reference: The pandemic caused disruption to many business activities.

source: Oshemereire kubanza wakyebera omu ofiisi y'eby'eitaka otakakaguzire.
reference: You should check with the lands office before you buy land.

source: Nkatunga obutumwa aha simu yangye ngu esente zashashurwa.
reference: I received a message on my phone that money had been paid.

source: Ebibaizirwe ebirungi nimbasa kubishanga nkahi?
reference: Where can I find good furniture?

source: Tinyine ebirikwetangwa okutunga omurimo ogwo.
reference: I don't have the required qualifications for that job.

source: Oine kubanza waahandikisa bizinesi yaawe.
reference: You need to register your business first.

source: Bizinesi nyingi omu Uganda tizihandikisize.
reference: Very many small businesses in Uganda are not registered.

source: Empungi ziine kuhwerwa zaaba ziri omu ihanga erisya.
reference: Refugees need to be helped while in a new country.

source: Nyine kugarura busya ekihandiiko ekirinyikiriza kuvuga ebiiruka.
reference: I need to renew my driving permit.

source: Uganda ekingire ensharo zaayo, okubaasa kuzibira okujanjara kwa Ebola.
reference: Uganda has closed its borders to stop the spread of Ebola.

source: Okunagaijura abaana kweyongyeire omu keeshereko.
reference: Child neglect cases have increased during the lockdown.

source: Tikihikire okusheeshura ebirikukwata aha murwaire.
reference: It is wrong to release patient records to the public.

source: Obumwe n'obumwe, buri omwe naaba naayenda kwehereera.
reference: Every person needs privacy at a certain moment in time.

source: Omuze gw'okushohoza amakuru agatahikire gweyongyeire.
reference: There is an increasing habit of spreading fake news.

source: Torikubaasa kweguza sente kuruga omu banka egyo oteinemu akawunti.
reference: You can not borrow money from that bank without a bank account.

source: Buri kampuni eshemereire kuhamya ngu abakozi baayo baine inshuwarensi.
reference: Every company should make sure that its workers have insurance.

source: Bizinesi eziri omu rurembo ahagati zihabwirwe kukingaho kuhisya obubareije kwigura.
reference: Businesses in the city centre have been told to close until further notice.

source: Abantu bashemereire kubanza bayetegyereza batakegurize sente kuruga omuri abo abarikuziguza.
reference: People should take caution before borrowing money from money lenders.

source: Za banka hamwe na kampuni z'amasimu baragiriirwe okukyendeza aha bishare by'okubiika n'okwihayo sente.
reference: Banks and telecom companies have been told to reduce fees on digital transactions.

source: Za banka niziija kwiguraho kumara eshaaha mukaaga zonka buri izooba.
reference: Banks will be open for only six hours a day.

source: Banka ya Uganda enkuru neereeberera ebitongore by'esnte byona omu ihanga.
reference: Bank of Uganda supervises all financial institutions in Uganda.

source: Ebishare by'okugura n'okuguza esente z'aheeru nibyeyongyera buri izooba.
reference: The foreign exchange rates are increasing every day.

source: Abarikuguza esente nibongyera amagoba buriizooba.
reference: Moneylenders are increasing interests every day.

source: Kooti z'ebiragiro niziija kwiguraho ahanyima y'oburwaire.
reference: Courts are set to resume after the pandemic.

source: Okurinda eshaaha n'eky'omugasho omushango gwaba niguhurirwa.
reference: Time management is very important during a court hearing.

source: Omuramuzi agizire ngu kooti neeza kukingaho kare eriizooba.
reference: The judge said that the court will be closed early today.

source: Eriizooba nibaza kwikiriza abantu bakye omu kooti.
reference: Few people will be allowed in court today.

source: Nitwetaga abaramuzi baingi kukora aha mishango esigaire.
reference: We need more judges to work on the very many pending cases.

source: Oburwaire bukatuma kooti zaayemerera.
reference: The pandemic led to the suspension of all court proceedings.

source: Encwa y'emanja neija kwoherezibwa aha intaneti.
reference: The court judgements can be sent to the applicants via email.

source: Akahayo ebi yaabaire aine kuhayo omu kooti esande ehweire
reference: He/she made their submission to court last week.

source: Omuramuzi omukuru akabinga emishango omu kooti ahanyima y'ekiragiro kya Mukuru w'eihanga aha sande.
reference: The chief justice suspended the court hearings after the new presidential directives on Sunday.

source: Gavumenti z'ebyanga nizijunanibwa okutaho ebiragiro.
reference: Local governments are responsible to enforce regulations.

source: Ebiragiro aha nshonga z'eby'amagara nibiija kutandika nyenkyakare.
reference: The new health directives will be effective starting tomorrow.

source: Mukuru w'eihanga yaaha ebiragiro bisya ebirikukwata ahaby'amagara.
reference: The president has issued new health directives to the nation.

source: Minisiture y'eby'amagara terikubaasa kurwanisa akakooko etaine buhwezi kuruga omu bantu.
reference: The ministry of health can not fight this virus without help from the public.

source: Banza omanye embeera eriho obwahati otakagumiizemu kwetomboitwa.
reference: Please take note of the current circumstances before you go on to complain.

source: Reeba ngu ebikorwa byawe nibigyendera omu mateeka.
reference: Make sure that your actions are within the law.

source: Byona ebiteirweho, nibigyendera omu biragiro
reference: All the measures offered are within the law.

source: Emihanda misya y'okukoreramu emirimo ereebekire omu biro by'oburwaire.
reference: New ways of working have come up during the pandemic.

source: Puriida akashaba omuramuzi ngu omushango bagumarire aheeru ya kooti.
reference: The lawyer requested the judge to settle the case outside the court.

source: Noyetaaga puriida ku raabe noyetaaga ngu enshonga egi ekorweho.
reference: You need to get a lawyer if you want this issue to be resolved.

source: Ekireije kubaho nenki ku araabe yaasharirwa orubanja rw'obushumankuzi?
reference: What are the repercussions if he/she is convicted of fraud?

source: Tibarakuratiire omuhanda oguhikire barikushaba emirimo.
reference: They did not follow the formal process while applying for jobs.

source: Oine kusharamu eky'okukora eriizooba.
reference: You need to make a decision today.

source: Okuhurira omushango gw'obwisi omu kooti, n'esande erikwija.
reference: The court hearing for the murder case is next week.

source: Tindikubaasa kukikiriza ngu omushango naitwe twagusingire.
reference: I could not believe the court ruling was on our side.

source: Baine kutunga okuhaburwa kuruga ahari puriida ohikire.
reference: They need to get legal advice from the right lawyer.

source: Ebirikukwata aha mushango ogu biri omu mikono y'omuramuzi.
reference: The fate of this court case is in hands of the judge.

source: N'enki ekyabaire ahagati yaabo?
reference: What happened between them?

source: Buri omwe naayenda obugabe bw'okugamba enshonga ze.
reference: Everyone needs the freedom to freely express their ideas.

source: Tukaganiira obwire buraingwa aha simu.
reference: We had a very long discussion on phone.

source: Ebiragiro bya kooti ebimwe tibirikukwata aha mushango.
reference: Some of the court rules have nothing to do with the actual dispute.

source: Okuhurira omushango omu kooti ninyencakare zitakahikire shaaha mukaaga.
reference: The court hearing is tomorrow before noon.

source: Okuhurira omushango omu kooti niryari?
reference: When will the court ruling be made?

source: Torikubaasa kwesiga buri omwe.
reference: You can not rely on everyone.

source: Ebyagambwaho omukuhanuura oku byona, tihaine ekishemeraire kushohora.
reference: Nothing said in this discussion should be disclosed to the public.

source: Byona ebirikukwata aha kuhikaanisa embaju zoona birindwe nk'ekihama.
reference: The information in the mediation is very confidential.

source: Ekirungi ebirikukwata kugarukanisa abantu nibiguma biri omu kihama.
reference: The good thing about settling a case at mediation is confidentiality.

source: Omushango okugumariira aheeru ya kooti, buri bamwe ab'embaju zombi baine kugira eki bafeerwa.
reference: To successfully settle the case outside court every party needs to give up something.

source: Abu kirikukwataho buriijo nibaheebwa omugisha kuteeraho kwikirizana omu nshonga zaabo.
reference: Usually, the parties are given an opportunity to work out their relationships.

source: Omushango baagumarira aheeru ya kooti, niguba gutarikushushana n'ogwacwerwa omu kooti.
reference: When a case is settled at mediation it's different from a normal court case.

source: Abu kirikukwataho tibarikukira kugarukana omu manja nkezi.
reference: Parties rarely reconcile after settling these cases.

source: Oine kutunga obuhame otakamutweire omu kooti
reference: You need proof before you take him/her to court.

source: Baingi abarikumarira emanja zaabo aheeru ya kooti nibakira kugaruka kuba amanywani.
reference: Many become friends again after settling their cases at mediation.

source: Mwamarira orubanja aheeru ya kooti tihaine orikushashura mugyenzi we esente ezi akoriise.
reference: Each party bears its costs when you settle the case at mediation

source: Akashabwa esente nyingi kugira ngu abaase kwemerererwa.
reference: He/she was asked for a lot of money to be bailed out.

source: Oburinganiza oburikukyerererwa nibwima omuntu oburinganiza obu aine kutunga.
reference: Justice delayed is justice denied.

source: Kihababa tareikiriize ebi kooti yaacwiremu.
reference: The plaintiff wasn't satisfied with the court ruling.

source: Kihababirwa naabaasa kwija kuba yaafiire, kooti etakashutamire omurundi ogundi.
reference: The defendant may be dead before the next court meeting.

source: Omukazi hamwe naiba nibaza kureetwa omu kooti orw'okubanza.
reference: The wife and the husband will be brought to court on Monday.

source: Omuramuzi buriijo niwe arikusharaho eby'omu kooti.
reference: The judge usually decides what happens in court.

source: Buri omwe ategyeriize eki kooti erasharemu.
reference: Everyone is waiting for the court ruling.

source: Tukatebeekanisa obujurizi kare ekirikumara kooti etakashutamire omurundi ogundi.
reference: We prepared the evidence early enough before the next court sitting.

source: Obutaikirizana obu nibubaasa kushobororwa omu kooti honka.
reference: This dispute can only be settled in the courts of law.

source: Puriida akahabura ngu okumarira orubanja aheeru ya kooti tikirikwija kushiisha obwire.
reference: The lawyer advised that settling the case at mediation will save time.

source: Omuramuzi takeizire.
reference: The judge hasn't arrived yet.

source: Obumwe kooti nikiriza abu kirikukwataho okushoborora eshonga zaabo aheeru ya kooti.
reference: Sometimes court allows parties to resolve issues outside court.

source: Baine kutunga omuntu w'okubagarukanisa oine ebirikwetengyesa.
reference: They need to choose a mediator who has the relevant qualifications.

source: Kihababirwa akashaba omuvunuuzi atakagizire eki yaagamba.
reference: The defendant requested an interpreter before he/she could say anything in court.

source: Hahweireho emyaka 13, kuruga obu kooti enkuru yaatandikaho enkora y'okugarukanisa abantu.
reference: Thirteen years have passed since mediation was introduced by the High Court.

source: Ebicweka makumi abiri na bitaano ebyabantu abarikujunaanwa, nibaba bataine mushango.
reference: Twenty-five per cent of convicted criminals are not criminals.

source: Ba puriida ba Uganda nibo barikusingayo oburungi omu burugw'izooba East Africa hakurateeho aba Tanzania na Rwanda.
reference: Uganda produces the second-best lawyers in East Africa followed by Tanzania and Rwanda.

source: Okubaasa kwetantara kuza omu kooti, oine kwetantara kukora ebihagaro.
reference: To avoid going to court one needs to avoid committing crimes.

source: Oshemereire kuhababira kampuni egyo.
reference: You should file a suit against that company.

source: Omuhababi wa gavumenti tarabaasize kugrukamu ekibuuzo ky'omuramuzi.
reference: The prosecutor couldn't answer the judge's question.

source: Buri omwe aine obugabe kuronda oburingaaniza.
reference: Everyone has a right to seek justice.

source: Obumwe ebiragiro nibinyangaraza abantu bituma baafa.
reference: Laws at times oppress and lead people to death.

source: Okushaba kwemerererwa nikwikirizibwa omu kooti.
reference: The bail application is acceptable in court.

source: Abakozi b'ebihagaro bashemereire kukwatwa
reference: Wrongdoers should be arrested.

source: Abantu abamwe tibakuheebwa bifubiro.
reference: Some people are exempted from punishment.

source: Okusharaho kwa kooti nikuhikaana n'ebiragiro.
reference: The court ruling is legal.

source: Ebikorwa ebirikuhenda ebiragiro nibijumirirwa kooti.
reference: Illegal acts are condemned by the court.

source: Abakozi b'ebihagaro, tibashemereire kugyenda bataheirwe kibonerezo
reference: Criminals should not go unpunished.

source: Ekitongore ky'ebiragiro omu Uganda neejumirira obwimukiriro omu karuuru
reference: Uganda's justice system discourages the use of violence in elections.

source: Obwahati Uganda eine omuramuzi omukuru
reference: Uganda now has a new chief justice.

source: Abantu abaabaire nibajunaanwa omushango gw'okushenya ekanisa bakeyemerererwa.
reference: The people who were involved in a church demolition case were released on bail.

source: Omwebembezi weihanga naagira ngu omwitsi nawe ashemereire kwitwa.
reference: The president believes that a killer should also be killed.

source: Puriida bamutwaire omu kooti endiijo.
reference: The lawyer has been moved to another court.

source: Ba puriida bakagamba na poriisi ebirikukwata aha muntu oyesimbire aharubaju orurikuhakanisa gavumenti.
reference: The lawyers talked to the police about the opposition candidate.

source: Omwebembezi yaabaasa kurahiza abaramuzi basya abandi bashatu.
reference: The leader has managed to swear in three new judges.

source: Puriida wangye naaza kutayo okujurira eshaaha yoona kuruga hati.
reference: My lawyer is lodging an appeal anytime from today.

source: Omusibe bakamusharira orubanja arikugyezaho kureeba omukuru omu biragiro.
reference: A suspect was convicted trying to access the head of the legislature

source: Omuhi w'omushoro niwe arikufeerwa esente, Gavumenti yaaheza kusingwa omushango.
reference: It's the taxpayer's money that is wasted when the government loses a court case.

source: Ebiragiro nibikora omu buri kicweka.
reference: Rules are part of every community.

source: Abegyesa abamwe nibagwera orubaju.
reference: Some teachers are usually biased.

source: Nitwetenga abajwekyerwa ab'amazima.
reference: We need honest representatives.

source: Za bizinesi nizihangaarira aha mabanja.
reference: Businesses survive on debt.

source: Okusharaho okwahamuheru bakuhikaho omu kooti eyashutama eriizooba.
reference: The final judgement was reached in today's court session.

source: Tindikukunda kushashura sente z'obupangisa.
reference: I don't like to pay rent.

source: Reka tubagane amagoba tutakakingire bizinesi
reference: Let us share the profits before closing the business.

source: Za kooti nizireetera abantu kukuratira amateeka agariho.
reference: Courts enforce the available laws.

source: Nitwenda kushobororerwa baitu kutari kwetomboitwa okundi.
reference: We need solutions not more complaints.

source: Omwaka ogu tugurize ebintu bingi kukira ebi tugurize omwaka oguhweire.
reference: The sales for this year are more than those for last year.

source: Niinye ndikuguza ebintu bya Kampuni egi.
reference: I am the salesperson for this company.

source: Ndi omwe ahabajwekyerwa ba kampuni.
reference: I am one of the company representatives.

source: Abantu baingi nibaza kwejumba omukuteera akaruuru aka.
reference: Very many people are going to vote in this election.

source: Ninyenda kutandika bizinesi ya Mobayiro Mane omuri Kasubi.
reference: I want to start a mobile money business in Kasubi.

source: Tihariho nshonga erikukureetera kutiina.
reference: You have no reason to fear.

source: Noobaasa kuhuumuraho?
reference: Can you please relax?

source: Empa mushoro yoona neeshabwa kugira enamba y'okushashuriraho omushoro.
reference: A taxpayer must have a tax identification number.

source: Obushuma bw'okuryangatinisa bweyongyeire omuri Kampala.
reference: Fraud is on the increase in Kampala.

source: Amaduuka gamwe omu rurembo, tigarikushashura mishoro.
reference: Some shops in town do not pay taxes.

source: Ebihandiiko byabahi b'omushoro bishemereire kurindwa kurungi.
reference: Taxpayers' records should be kept safely for future reference.

source: Okwiba omushoro tikirikwikirizibwa omu biragiro.
reference: Tax fraud is illegal and punishable by law.

source: Abatuuragye abamwe tibarikwenda kushashura omushoro.
reference: Some citizens do not like to pay tax.

source: Omu rurembo harimu abaryangatanisa baingi.
reference: There are many con men in town.

source: Obujurizi bwahamya ebihababirwe.
reference: Evidence confirms allegations made.

source: Gavumenti neeshoresa abantu erikuraba omukushoresa ebintu ebirikukozesibwa omu maka.
reference: The government is taxing citizens by taxing products for home use.

source: Emishango emwe neyongyerwayo ahabw'eshonga z'ebiragiro.
reference: Some cases are referrals for purposes of the law.

source: Za kooti ziine kucwa emanja z'oburingaaniza.
reference: Courts must give a fair and just ruling.

source: Omuntu naaba ataine rubanja kuhisya obu barahamye ngu ekirikumugambwaho akakikora.
reference: One is innocent until proven guilty.

source: Abanyabiragiro nibo barikwebembera omu kubihenda.
reference: Legislators are the leading lawbreakers

source: Buri kampuni eshemereire kworeka ku erikushashura emishoro.
reference: Every business must file a tax return.

source: Obushomankuzi tibirikwirizibwa omu biragiro.
reference: Fraud is punishable by law.

source: Tiimu y'ekitongore ekirikujunanizibwa okushorooza emishoro aha nsharo eine amaani.
reference: The revenue authority team at the border is very tough.

source: Omushoro gwa Value added Tax nibagushorooza ahabintu ebikozire amakorero.
reference: Value-added tax is commonly charged on products.

source: Kihababirwa akarira omu kooti arikugyezaho kworeka abantu ngu taine rubanja.
reference: The accused shed tears in court to try and prove their innocence.

source: Ebiragiro biteirweho okuzibira obushomankuzi n'ebindi bihagaro.
reference: Laws have been established to prevent fraud and other related crimes.

source: Twine kwongyera ebindi bintu omu duuka okwezi okurikwija.
reference: We need to add new stock to the shop next month.

source: Omushango gw'omu kooti ogu gutwaire obwire bwingi kukira oku twabaire nituteekateeka.
reference: This court case is taking longer than we anticipated.

source: Ebirishazirwamu bishemereire kuba nibyetegyerezibwa buri omwe.
reference: Decisions made must be clear and understandable for everyone.

source: Okuhababira omuntu kyonka tikirikworeka ngu aine omushango
reference: Allegations alone are not enough to prove that one is guilty.

reference: I get sad at times by the things people do.

source: Bashemereire kutunga ebiconco ahabw'amadaara gaabo.
reference: They should receive rewards for a higher ranking.

source: Nitusiima eby'okurya ebirituheebwa abaserukare.
reference: We are thankful for the meals provided to soldiers.

source: Omurwaire akasibuurwa kuruga omu irwariro okwezi okuhweire.
reference: The patient was discharged from hospital last month.

source: Emishaara yabashaho abeebembeire omu kujanjaba eshemereire kwongyezibwa kashatu.
reference: Frontline health workers' salaries should be tripled.

source: Omukazi eki arikugamba nikiija kushobororwa.
reference: A lady's claim will be clarified.

source: Esimu eza busha eziriho tizirikurabamu.
reference: There is high traffic on the toll-free lines.

source: Omwebembezi weihanga yahitsya emirunda erikurenga makumi abiri arikugambira aha tivi.
reference: The president has appeared more than twenty times on television.

source: Tiimu ehikize ebintu aha kishayi ky'endegye Entebbe barikukozesa endegye y'ekitongore kya Ethiopian.
reference: A team delivered a consignment at the Entebbe International Airport using the Ethiopian Airlines.

source: Nitwetenga oburugo bw'amakuru kugira ngu tugume nitumanya ebintu ahu byahika.
reference: We need new information sources in order to keep up to date.

source: Amataba gaburize empungi nyingi obutaaho.
reference: Floods have displaced several refugees.

source: Takisi omu Kampala zeemereziibwe kukora.
reference: Taxi operation in Kampala has been halted.

source: Okutwara eitaka ry'eiramizo tikirungi.
reference: Taking over church land is not a good idea.

source: Aha mukoro gw'okwanjura, nikirungi kugira ebyeshongoro birungi.
reference: During the introduction ceremonies, it is important to have good songs.

source: Naaba nyine emotoka yangye ensya nimbaasa kwetantara omwijuzo gw'ebiiruka omu Kampala.
reference: With my new car, I can easily avoid all the traffic in Kampala.

source: Kampuni y'empurizagana eshemereire kutwikiriza tukakora hatariho ekirikututeganisa.
reference: The communications company should allow us to operate freely.

source: Ekika ky'emotoka eki orikukunda nikiiha?
reference: Which car brand do you prefer?

source: Erangi neeyetenga kubanza yaayoma otakagishwekire.
reference: The paint needs to dry first before you cover it.

source: Reka tugambe nawe tumanye amazima.
reference: Let us talk to him/her and get to the truth of the matter.

source: Ahabwenki kigumire okutunga rukundo ey'amazima
reference: Why is it so difficult to find true love?

source: Rukundo eyahare, neeyetenga omukundwa orikwesigwa
reference: A long-distance relationship needs a faithful partner.

source: Nikintangaaza okureeba nayanguhirwa kuganiira na munywani wangye kunkira.
reference: I wonder why he/she's more open to my friend than me.

source: Omukazi wangye naaguma nandeeba omukasheeshe
reference: My wife constantly looks at me in the morning.

source: Mutaahi wangye akiriire hakye okufa nyekiro.
reference: My neighbour narrowly survived death last night.

source: Kampuni yaitu neehereza abakozire gye ebiconco buri mwaka
reference: Our company gives awards to the best performers annually.

source: Tarikuhindura aha bigambo bye n'obu haraabe hariho ebi barikumugambaho.
reference: He/she still maintains their word despite the allegations against him/her.

source: Omu Uganda harimu obwimukiriro bwingi bw'eitaka.
reference: There are many land wrangles in Uganda.

source: Okugira omukoro murungi gw'okugaitwa  nikyetenga omutebekanisa murungi.
reference: It requires a good wedding planner to have a successful function.

source: N'amazima akaba ashemereire kutunga ekiconco ky'okwanjura eby'emyoga omwihanga
reference: He/she truly deserved the award for the best arts reporter in the country.

source: Mugyezeho n'omwe aha bateezi b'ebishushani abarungi abu twine omu tawuni.
reference: Try him/her, he/she is one of the good photographers we have around town.

source: Nikiza kunshemeza okukuhereza amakuru maingi nk'oku kirikubaasika.
reference: I would be happy to provide much information as possible.

source: Ekisasi ky'amutaahi wangye kikashishwa enjura nyingi
reference: amaadhi agevudhye.

source: Omukazi wa meeya akatuhiga ngu tukore n'amaani ahabw'ebiro birungi bya nyensya.
reference: The mayor's wife encouraged us to work hard for a better future.

source: Rukundo yaitu neija kusiisikara waaba otatungire murimo?
reference: Will our friendship be damaged if you don't get that job?

source: Ba shwenkuru na ba nyokwenkuru nabo bakagasirwa omu buhwezi bwa gavumenti omwaka oguhweire.
reference: My grandparents also benefited from government aid last year.

source: Aha murimo gwawe, abakozi boona nibatunga okutendekwa okw'omutaano?
reference: Are all employees at your workplace offered a special training course?

source: Ab'eka y'omushaija owafiire ahanyima y'okuhanuka aha roore, tibaine bigambo.
reference: The family of a man who died after jumping from the lorry are speechless.

source: Okushandara kw'amaizi kukareetera ekirombe kuhirima.
reference: Flooding caused the mine to collapse.

source: N'emwe aha marembo agaherize kutandikwaho.
reference: It is one of the newly created cities.

source: Ekirikubaasa kumaraho eibura ry'amashanyarazi n'okwombeka daamu ezindi.
reference: The solution to load shedding is building more dams.

source: Ninteisa ngu ebyoma byona obiiheho ahabwire bw'okubyama.
reference: I suggest you get rid of all gadgets when it's sleeping time.

source: Nikyenda ngu omuntu ajware amare aha mugoye okubaasa kureebeka gye.
reference: It is unnecessary for one to dress excessively in order to look stylish

source: Ninshemererwa, naaba ndi ahamurimo ndikureeba ebintu okubirikugyenda.
reference: I enjoy being at work and checking to know how things are going.

source: N'ekyobusaasi okureeba ngu nituranga okufa kwa taata .
reference: It is with sorrow that we announce the death of our beloved father

source: Sebo, aga nigo mazima.
reference: Sir, this is the truth.

source: Akakora munonga kugira ngu omukazi ashemererwe
reference: He worked hard for his wife's happiness.

source: Omu ruteerane, n'enki ekyakuteganisize?
reference: What challenges did you face during the conference?

source: Okucondooza aha sente z'okurwanisa oburwaire Korona ezaibirwe, kuriyo nikugyenda omu maisho.
reference: Investigations are ongoing on the embezzlement of Coronavirus disease funds.

source: Omu Uganda harimu amaka agarikurya omurundi gumwe omu izooba.
reference: There are families in Uganda which have only one meal per day.

source: Eminyeeto n'abaana nibetaaga okuhaburwa kuruga omu bazaire baabo n'abakuza.
reference: Youths and children need daily advice from their parents and guardians.

source: Emitumbi yeherize kureebeka ahanyima y'enjura nyamwingi eyarugiremu okushandara kw'amaizi.
reference: Dead bodies have been recovered after the heavy rainfall resulted in strong floods.

source: Eitendekyero ryona eriine embaririra nungi niribaasa kuheebwa esente.
reference: Any institute with proper accountability strategy is eligible for funding.

source: Gavumenti eshemereire kushara ahamyaka ei abakozi baayo bashemereire kuhuumuriraho.
reference: The government should lower the retirement age for its workers.

source: Endwano ahagati y'abantu abarikuzaarwa hamwe ebiro ebi nizireebeka munonga.
reference: Fights between brothers and sisters are common these days.

source: Nyabura we, reeba ngu omugore na kishwera bahika aha kanisa /kereziya bukiri kare aha rwa mukaaga.
reference: omukaaga.

source: Okubuririza nikworeka ngu ba memba ba ishengyero nibatunga omushaara ogurikukirayo obwingi omu bakozi ba gavumenti boona.
reference: Investigations show that members of the legislature earn the biggest salary amongst public servants.

source: Aha murundi ogu, abanya Uganda nibaza kusharamu batoorane omuntu oraije kubebembera.
reference: This the time Ugandans will decide who their leaders will be.

source: Namazima ,omuntu nabaasa kuguma ayesimbireho wenka hataine omwesimbireho omu karuuru
reference: It's true that anyone can run unopposed in primaries.

source: Omu karuuru akarikutandikirwaho, noobaasa kusinga nainga osingurwe.
reference: In primaries, you expect to win or lose.

source: Niwe mwebembezi otegyekire emyaka mingi omu Uganda
reference: He/she is the longest-serving president of Uganda.

source: Eminyeeto mingi eyegaisire aha bibiina by'obutegyeki
reference: Many youths are joining political parties.

source: Okukora gye nikyo kirikukira kwetengwa omu bantu abesimbire omu by'obutegyeki.
reference: Performance is key for political aspirants

source: Omuntu ow'amazima oyesimbireho, ashemereire kumanya ngu naabaasa kusingurwa.
reference: Losing an election should be expected of a prudent candidate.

source: Buri omwe naabaasa kusingura omu karuuru.
reference: Anyone is capable of winning an election.

source: Abantu bamwe abesimbireho, okusingurwa nikubashwaza.
reference: Losing an election is a shame to some contestants.

source: Okwiba akaruuru kushemereire kuhwaho.
reference: Cheating in elections must come to an end.

source: Okwiba oburuuru kushemereire kujumirirwa omu byanga.
reference: Vote rigging should be condemned in the community.

source: Akaruuru akarimu amazima n'oburinganiza, nikwe kushemererwa kwa buri omwe oyesimbireho.
reference: Free and fair elections are the joy of all political candidates.

source: Obwimukiriro omukuteera akaruuru bwine kurekyera aho.
reference: Violence during elections must stop.

source: Okwejumba omuby'obutegyeki bw'eihanga nikitwara obwire.
reference: Engaging in national politics takes time.

source: Akaruuru akatarimu bwimukiriro, nikabaasika
reference: Violent free elections are possible.

source: Emiringo emwe ey'okuteera akaruuru teri mirungi.
reference: Some election methods are not fair.

source: Omwebembezi oriho obwahati naabaasa kusingwa yaaba ategyendesereize
reference: The incumbent shall lose if not careful.

source: Enteerane ezirikubaho abantu baingi nizetengwa?
reference: Are public rallies necessary?

source: Nikikirizibwa omuby'obutegyeki omuntu kuguma ateine kibiina.
reference: It is okay for one to be politically independent.

source: Abateezi b'akaruuru bashemereire kwegyesibwa babaase kwetantara obwimukiriro.
reference: Voters should be informed about elections to avoid chaos.

source: Abarikuraarika abantu omubyaro, nibabataho bukiri kare.
reference: Village mobilisers are recruited ahead of time.

source: Obujunanizibwa bw'omukiiki omu ishengyero n'obumanya?
reference: Do you know the roles for the member of parliament?

source: Eminyeeto emingi eshaziremu kwegaita omu by'obutegeki omu Kampala.
reference: Many youths have decided to join politics in Kampala.

source: Torikubaasa kuteera akaruuru waaba oteine endanga muntu.
reference: You can not vote if you don't have the National Identity Card.

source: Omuntu weena omu by'obutegyeki ashemereire kuba naamanya byona ebiri omu omu kicweka eki arikujwekyera.
reference: Every politician needs to be knowledgeable about their constituency.

source: Buri omwe naabaasa kwesimba aha ntebe y'eby'obutegyeki, yaaba aine ebirikwetengwa.
reference: Everyone can stand for a political office as long as they have the requirements.

source: Ab'eby'obutegyeki abamwe bakaiba akaruuru kugira ngu bahinduke abakiiki omwishengyero.
reference: Some politicians rigged elections to become members of parliament.

source: Amarwariro tigaine eby'okukozesa ebirikumara omu kuragurira abarwaire ba Korona.
reference: Hospitals lack resources to treat patients of coronavirus.

source: Ekibiina ekiri omu butegyeki kiine obwesigye bwingi ngu nikiza kusingura omu karuuru akarikwija.
reference: The ruling party strongly believes that they are going to win the upcoming elections.

source: Omu bwire bw'akaruuru, abesimbireho nibaha abantu esente nyingi ngu babasherurire oburuuru.
reference: During elections, candidates spend more money on people to try and get their votes.

source: Abantu ba Entebe tibarejumbire omu karuuru k'okutoorana abebembezi b'eminyeeto.
reference: People in Entebbe did not turn up for youth elections.

source: Ab'ebyobutegyeki nibapangisa abantu baingi omu byaro kubasherurira oburuuru.
reference: Politicians hire many village people to look for votes.

source: Ab'ebyobutegyeki nibagamba munonga ebishuba omu bwire bw'ehururu
reference: Politicians tell a lot of lies during campaigns.

source: Ebihama bingi nibishohora omu bwire bw'ehururu.
reference: Many secrets get revealed during campaigns.

source: Hakabaho akaimukiriro, mukuru w'entebe yakakiiko k'eby'oburuuru kuyarangiriire abahanguzi babiri omu mwanya gumwe.
reference: Chaos erupted when the chairman of electoral commission announced two winners for the same position.

source: Omu karuuru k'ebibiina by'obutegyeki, amasasi gakateerwa.
reference: Shots were fired during the political party elections.

source: Ekibiina ky'obutegyeki ekiine abashagiki bakye munonga nakyo nikyenda kwejumba omu karuuru akarikwija.
reference: The least supported party in Ugandan also wants to participate in the upcoming elections.

source: Abakiiki omu ishengyero nabo baine kugyenda omu kutooranwa
reference: The members of parliament also have to go for nominations.

source: Ekibiina ekiri omu butegyeki kyetekateekire kuhajaana omu karuuru akarikwija.
reference: The ruling party is ready to compete in the upcoming elections.

source: Omwebembezi w'eihanga aketegyereza akavuyo omu karuuru k'ekibiina.
reference: The president observed the chaos in the party elections.

source: Abakiiki b'omwishengyero baingi abariho obwahati, bakasingwa omu karuuru k'ebibiina byabo akabandize.
reference: Many of the current member of parliaments lost in their party elections.

source: Okwiba oburuuru kweyongyeire omu Disiturikiti.
reference: Election malpractice is on the increase in that district.

source: Abashagiki bakahakanisa ebyarugire omu kutoorana abakazi abakiiki omu ishengyero
reference: The supporters protested over the women member of parliament results.

source: Abarikuhajaanira entebe y'obwa meeya, n'eminyeeto yonka.
reference: The mayoral seat elections have only the youth.

source: Akaruuru ka ba meeya, nikaza kuteerwa nyenkyakare
reference: Mayor elections will be carried out tomorrow.

source: Akaruuru buriijo kaine kuba karungi kandi kaine oburinganiza.
reference: Elections have to always be free and fair.

source: Omushaija ayetsimbire n'omuhara omu karuuru aka boona.
reference: A man is competing against his daughter in the general elections.

source: Okutugira abateezi b'akaruuru tikihikire.
reference: Voter bribery is not a good thing.

source: Ebirugire omu karuuru, bishemereire kurangirirwa ahonaaho.
reference: Election results are supposed to be announced as soon as possible.

source: Hashemereire kubaho obumwe omu kibiina, okubaasa kusinga akaruuru.
reference: It requires unity within the party to win an election.

source: N'eky'oburinganiza kuha abasya abeesimbireho omugisha okujwekyera ebibiina byabo.
reference: It is fair to give new candidates a chance to represent their parties.

source: Hati kihindukire ekya butoosha, okurwanira emyanya y'eby'obutegyeki.
reference: It has now become usual for politicians to conflict over positions.

source: Omu kyanga kyabo, entebe y'obwa meeya, abantu bana nibo bagyesimbireho.
reference: In their region, the mayoral seat has attracted four aspirants.

source: Titurateire karuuru, ahabw'okuba obupapura bw'okuteeza akaruuru tiburareesirwe omu  kicweka kyaitu.
reference: We didn't vote because of failure to supply ballots at the polling station in our area.

source: Meeya w'orurembo rwaitu akagwa kihuumura, ahanyima y'okusingwa owaabaire amwesimbireho.
reference: Our city mayor collapsed after he lost to his opponent.

source: Tindateire karuuru ahabw'okuba eiziina ryangye tirirareebekire omu kitabo ky'abateezi b'akaruuru.
reference: I didn't vote because my name did not appear on the voters' register.

source: Oshemereire kuza omu by'obutegyeki kuheereza abantu, kutari kukyenkuuza abantu.
reference: You should enter politics to serve not to exploit.

source: Ninyebuuza ahabw'enki hariho omuze gwa "ni mwene oha" omu by'obutegyeki bw'eihanga ryeitu.
reference: l wonder why there is too much nepotism in the politics of our country.

source: Akatushaba ngu tuze omu mwanya gw'okuteereramu akaruuru tugume tukamukuumiire.
reference: He/she asked us to go to the polling place and act as their poll watchers.

source: Ahanyima y'okumurangirira nk'omusinguzi, akakora akabaga k'obusinguzi ahonaaho.
reference: After declaring them the winner, she threw a victory party right away.

source: Omu kyaro kyaitu, tiharabairemu omuringo gw'akaimukiriro koona omu karuuru .
reference: There wasn't any kind of violence in elections at our home village.

source: Omwe aha bahagizi, akahutaazibwa munonga, ariikujaguza obusinguzi.
reference: One of the supporters was severely injured while jubilating their win.

source: Abanya Uganda abamwe, baribatiriire ebiragiro by'okuteera akaruuru omwaka ogu.
reference: A given section of Ugandans has violated the voting guidelines this year.

source: Ababaire beesimbireho tibakaikiriize ebirangiriirwe kuruga omu karuuru.
reference: The contestants have not agreed with the results declared in the elections.

source: Okukundwa kwe, kumuhindwire omusinguzi omu by'obutegyeki omu ihanga.
reference: His/her popularity made him/her a successful politician in the country.

source: Akasigaza kaadi y'ekibiina, okukikwatira bendera omu karuuru ka boona akarikwija.
reference: He/she retained the card for the party flag bearer for the upcoming general elections.

source: Abanyamahurire, bashabirwe kuheereza omu karuuru ka boona akarikwija bataine kutiina kwona.
reference: Journalists have been urged to cover the coming elections without fear.

source: Omuhendo mukye gw'abantu abeejumbire omu karuuru ka disiturikiti hamwe n'entebe y'obwa meeya, gureesirwe eibura ry'ehururu nainga kampeini.
reference: Small voter involvement in the district and mayoral polls is attributed to no campaigns.

source: Obwimukiriro omu karuuru, nikirugirira aha bikorwa bingi by'okutakuratira mateeka.
reference: Violence in elections can be caused by a number of unlawful acts.

source: Abeebembezi bakwataniise hamwe, okutunguura amahanga gaabo.
reference: The leaders have come together to develop their nations.

source: Ebibiina by'obutegyeki bishemereire kweshwijuma, kugira ngu bitunguuke.
reference: Political parties should evaluate themselves to improve.

source: Ekibiina ky'obutegyeki ekyo tikikiine mugasho.
reference: That political party has lost its value.

source: Buri muntu omu by'obutegyeki, naagyezaho kutunga abashagiki, omu karuuru ka boona akarikwija.
reference: Every politician is trying to gain support because of the upcoming elections.

source: Turi omu sande y'ahamuheru, omu hururu z'akaruuru k'okutoorana omwebembezi w'eihanga.
reference: We are in the last week of campaigns for presidential elections.

source: Akaaruuru aka, kari ahagati y'amaka abiri agarikumanywa munonga omuri Kasubi.
reference: This election race is between the two prominent families in Kasubi.

source: Babiri abeesimbireho omu bibiina ebirikuhakanisa Gavumenti, nibateekateeka kukora omukago, akaruuru k'Eihanga aka boona katakatandikire.
reference: The two opposition candidates are working on a coalition before the national elections.

source: Okuhakanira entebe y'eishengyero omu burugw'izooba, buriijo nikuba kurimu akeimukiriro n'okuhenda ebiragiro.
reference: A tight parliamentary race in the East is normally characterised with the violation of the law

source: Enkora y'Omwebembezi weihanga okwikiriza abantu abatahikiriire omuby'obutegyeki, neija kushisha ekibiina ekiri omu butegyeki.
reference: Enrolment of unproven people into politics by the president will break the ruling party.

source: Abaabaireho ba minisita b'eihanga, obwahati besimbireho kuhakanira entebe y'okujwekyera abantu omwishengyero.
reference: Former members of Cabinet are in the race to become members of parliament.

source: Abeegyesa bagumiizemu nibeegyesa abaana omu muringo murungi ogurikushemeza, n'obu baraabe bateine bikwato ebirikumara.
reference: With a few resources, teachers continue delivering exciting and effective lessons.

source: Nkaitwe abarikukunda omuzaano gw'okwiruka, nitwesiima okureeba ngu omwiruki osingire, arugire omu Ihanga ryaitu.
reference: As athletics fans, we are proud to have the fastest runner from our country.

source: Eihanga ryeitu nindiha ekitiinisa.
reference: I  salute to our nation!

source: Eizooba eri nirijaguzibwa ebiro mwenda okwezi kweikumi buri mwaka.
reference: This day is celebrated on October ninth of every year.

source: Arindiriire ebirugire omu kubuuzibwa n'ekihika kingi.
reference: He/she is anxiously waiting for the release of the results.

source: Mukuru weishomero akaheebwa ekiconco kumusiima.
reference: The headteacher was awarded a token of appreciation.
